observer
Interface WorkspacePublisher

All Known Implementing Classes:
IDESWorkspace, WorkspacePublisherAdaptor
public interface WorkspacePublisher

Publisher of Workspace messages.

Author:
Lenko Grigorov

Method Summary
 void addSubscriber(WorkspaceSubscriber subscriber)
          Attaches the given subscriber to this publisher.
 void fireRepaintRequired()
          Triggers a notification to all subscribers that a repaint is required.
 void removeSubscriber(WorkspaceSubscriber subscriber)
          Removes the given subscriber to this publisher.
 

Method Detail

addSubscriber

void addSubscriber(WorkspaceSubscriber subscriber)
Attaches the given subscriber to this publisher. The given subscriber will receive notifications of changes from this publisher.

Parameters:
subscriber -

removeSubscriber

void removeSubscriber(WorkspaceSubscriber subscriber)
Removes the given subscriber to this publisher. The given subscriber will no longer receive notifications of changes from this publisher.

Parameters:
subscriber -

fireRepaintRequired

void fireRepaintRequired()
Triggers a notification to all subscribers that a repaint is required.
